duties_responsibilities.duty: Review portfolio and select delinquent accounts for collection efforts, negotiate payment arrangements for delinquent accounts, and evaluate customer records.
Assign terms and credit limits to current and prospective customers, review credit applications, and assist in developing credit rating criteria and internal scoring models.
Maintain a customer service focus, contribute to the continuous improvement of internal credit policies, and prepare credit and collection correspondence as necessary.
Assist in removing obstacles that may prevent customer payment, process credit card payments, and provide answers to customer inquiries regarding billing and payment issues.
Prepare accounts for a write-off, collection agency, or litigation, retrieve and prepare audit documentation, and file documentation to protect the company.
Understand regulations governing business-to-business credit specific to the industry, such as bankruptcies and lien laws.
Participate in special projects and perform other duties as required.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required, college degree preferred
